post.text:
'Obama Warned Of Rigged Elections In 2008.' Time to #DrainTheSwamp
http://bit.ly/2dGeiObama2008

comment.author: Alaina
comment.text: Voting for Killary just because she's a woman is like drinking antifreeze because it looks like Gatorade. Remember when everyone wanted a black president. How TF did that work out for us. Im voting for Trump because he is our REAL last hope. The man knows how to turn this country around folks. Wake up and face reality.

replies.author: Jade
replies.text: Wait so now Obama is right?
